profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyoneâ€™s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. Weâ€™re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
Weâ€™re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years weâ€™ve been in business, weâ€™ve never had an unresolved complaint. Weâ€™re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.

profile:
Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. All Euro Choice Windows & Doors products are built to strict specifications and are regularly inspected for operation and craftsmanship. All our staff is professional and courteous with many years of experience. Since we do not use sub-contractors we have a reputation for consistency and quality. This reputation took nearly 20 years to build and we are proud to see our windows and doors in your home.

profile:
Before establishing Markâ€™s Windows & Doors in St. Catharines, ON, Mark started out working for a high-volume company in Markham, ON. As an apprentice to a window installer, Mark learned the importance of maintaining a standard of excellence at all times.

After several years, Mark bought a truck and some tools, and took on the role as the lead installer for the company. He then moved on to work for a large box store, where he saw the difference in the quality of products and services that were being offered to the lower-end side of the business. Mark has been doing this work for over 28 years. 

Expanding His Skill Set
Markâ€™s creative nature prompted him to start designing and building decks. He has always put safety above everything because he cares about the well-being of his clients.

As Markâ€™s knowledge increased, so did his desire to become involved in the windows and doors business. He started working for an Anderson supplier where he had the opportunity to take on projects in high-end homes. Also, he became acquainted with the service and sales side of the windows and doors industry.

Every Client Is a Partner
Ever since Mark founded his own company, he has considered every project as a partnership, listening to and learning from his clients. He guarantees the work we do and the products we offer, always striving to deliver to our clientsâ€™ expectations.

Whether you want to have a door installed or a fence constructed, expect 100% satisfaction if you choose Markâ€™s Windows & Doors.
products: Markâ€™s Windows & Doors carries products that are manufactured by some of the most trusted and respected names in the home improvement industry. We have items from Royal Windows and Doors, Kaycan, and Ostaco. The products that we have in our inventory include vinyl siding, doors, and windows.

profile:
A.C. Vinyl Windows started in 1986 as one of the earliest fabricators of PVC windows in Ontario, Canada.  We manufacture high-quality thermal windows primarily for renovations and private customized residential buildings. Our windows are built of lead-free UiPVC extrusions from industry leader, REHAU Industries, and only the finest quality dual seal insulating glass and hardware in our windows.  We want home owners to replace their windows with our windows for a lifetime of performance.
A.C. Vinyl Windows is a family-owned and operated company, incorporating two generations, whose founder Francisco (Frank) Cabral continues to work in his plant with his people and has had a very hands-on approach to management.  Our manufacturing facility in the Niagara Region has grown from 2,500 square feet to 22,000 square feet on 14 acres of prime industrial land.  We attribute our growth to thousands of referrals through word-of-mouth. We currently distribute windows through an extensive network of dealers throughout Ontario.  All our windows are custom-built to customer specifications.

A.C. Vinyl Windows retail division operates under the name of First Choice Vinyl Windows Ltd.
